owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The Research Data Management ontology (RDM ontology) is developed to describe research data and all activities related to its management. RDM ontology was developed as a communication hub between the NII Research Data Cloud (NII-RDC) systems, but is being developed as an ontology that can be applied to any research data management platform. The domain model of RDM ontology is designed to comply with best practices regarding persistent identifiers. RDM ontology is also activity-centered in its design philosophy inspired by the Activity Streams 2.0, W3C Document 13 April 2018 (https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams#).

研究データ管理オントロジー (RDM オントロジー) は、研究データとその管理に関わるすべての活動を記述することを目的として設計されました。RDM オントロジーは、 NII 研究データクラウド (NII-RDC) の基盤間でのコミュニケーションハブとして開発されましたが、あらゆる研究データ管理プラットフォームに応用できるオントロジーとしても開発が進んでいます。RDM オントロジーのドメインモデルは、永続識別子に関するベストプラクティスに準拠するよう設計されました。また、 RDM オントロジーは、 Activity Streams 2.0、W3C Document 13 April 2018 (https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams#) にインスパイアされた設計思想で、アクティビティ中心でもあります。

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ask

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of assigning a role to Person.
Person に役割を任命する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Assign

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An audio file.
音声
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Audio

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of granting permission or right to an object.
権利や許可を与える行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Authorize

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A book.
書籍
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Book

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of checking the regulation for Resource, such as using checkboxes.
チェックボックスに印をつけるなど、規定の項目に関して確認する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Check

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of performing data cleansing of Resource.
Resource をデータクレンジングする行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cleanse

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of collecting Resource.
Resource を収集する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collect

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of items.
オブジェクトのコレクション
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of generating a comment on Resource.
Resource に対してコメントをする行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Comment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Resource related to conferences.
カンファレンスに関連するリソース
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConferenceObject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A conference paper.
カンファレンスペーパー
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConferencePaper

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A conference proceeding.
カンファレンスプロシーディング
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConferenceProceeding

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of connecting service to another service.
サービスを別のサービスに接続する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Connect

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of converting Resource into a new Resource.
Resource を新たな Resource に変換する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Convert

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of creating/producing/generating Resource, Project, Collection etc.
Project, Resource, Collection などを作成する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Create

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A data management plan (DMP).
データ管理計画(DMP)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DataManagementPlan

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A dataset.
データセット
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dataset

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of deploying SoftwareApplication or Resource.
Resource, SoftwareApplicationをデプロイする行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Deploy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of developing a program.
プログラミングで実装する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Develop

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of downloading Resource.
Resource をダウンロードする行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Download

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of creating a log file by dumping.
ダンプによりログファイルを作成する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dump

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Resource related to educational, such as slides for lecture.
教育関連資料
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EducationalResource

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of evaluating Resource, such as peer-review.
ピアレビューなど、Resource を評価する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Evaluate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An event, such as conferences etc.
学会など、イベントや催し物
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of executing SoftwareApplication, Resource, program etc.
Resource, SoftwareApplication, プログラムを実行する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Execute

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Experiment
実験
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Experiment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An organization that funds research activities.
研究資金提供機関
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FundingAgency

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of getting/obtaining Resource, information etc.
Resource または情報などを取得する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Get

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A grant for research activities.
研究資金プログラム
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Grant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An identifier.
識別子
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Identifier

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An image file.
画像
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Image

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of notifying Person/Institution of information.
Person, Institution に対して通知する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Inform

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of getting and adding metadata to Resource from public information as part of data curation.
キュレーションの一環として、Resource のメタデータを外部から取得し付与する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ingest

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An organization.
機関や組織
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Institution

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract class for concepts without entities.
実体を伴わない概念のための抽象クラス
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Intangible

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of integrating different forms of metadata as part of data curation.
キュレーションの一環として、メタデータを統合する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Integrate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A journal.
ジャーナル
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Journal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An article published in a journal.
ジャーナル論文
owl:Class.rdfs:label: JournalArticle

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A license of Resource.
リソースのライセンス
owl:Class.rdfs:label: License

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Message and comment.
メッセージやコメント
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Message

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Metadata of any Resource.
Resource に関するメタデータ
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MetadataDocument

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Activity の目的語となる事物
Things and objects that are the object of Activity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Object

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An other Resource.
その他のリソース
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OtherResource

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A person.
人物
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A preprint.
プレプリント
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Preprint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of saving and storing Resource to Repository, SoftwareApplication etc.
Resource を Repository, SoftwareApplication などに保存・保管する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Preserve

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A research project.
研究プロジェクト
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of making Resource public, such as by pushing "publish" button on publishing service. (including Resource of any access rights)
公開ボタンを押すなどして、Resource を公開する行動(アクセス権の種類は問わない)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Publish

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of registering Resource to Repository, SoftwareApplication or other service.
Repository, SoftwareApplication もしくはその他サービスに、 Resource を登録する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Register

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of rejecting proposal/assigned role/submitted Resource etc.
提出された Resource や提案、割り当てられた役割などを取り下げる行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of renaming Resource.
Resource の名称を変更する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rename

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of changing folder structure of Dataset.
Dataset のフォルダ構成を変更する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reorganize

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A report.
レポート、報告書
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A repository.
リポジトリ
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Repository

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A digital object, such as research data, video of experiments rtc.
研究データや実験動画など、デジタルオブジェクト
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resource

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of re-structuring Resource as part of data curation, such as sorting a table.
表データをソートするなど、キュレーションの一環として Resource を再構成する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Restructure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Review documents and evaluations.
レビュー文書や評価
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Review

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A higer-level class that relates to various rights.
権利関係全般に関連するクラス
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightsStatement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Roles and positions.
役割、役職
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Role

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of scheduling future Event.
未来に行われる Event を設定する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Schedule

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of searching Resource, such as by pushing "search" button.
検索ボタンの押下など、Resource を検索する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Search

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of selecting from options.
選択肢の中から利用するものを選択する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Select

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of dispatching Resource.
Resource を送る行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Send

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A software application.
ソフトウェアアプリケーション
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SoftwareApplication

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A standard.
標準
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Standard

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of presenting or proposing options.
選択肢を提示する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Suggest

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A thesis.
学位論文
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thesis

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of updating an existing Resource with changes.
既存の Resource に変更を加え更新する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Update

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of uploading Resource to Repository, SoftwareApplication etc.
Resource を SoftwareApplicationやRepository 等にアップロードする行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Upload

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A video file.
動画
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Video

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An act of creating a visualization based on data, such as making a graph.
グラフを生成するなど、データを元に可視化する行動
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Visualize

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A workflow.
ワークフロー
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Workflow

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Embargoed access (metadata only access until released for open access on a certain date).
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: EmbargoedAccess
